thought.text:
Perfect! Now I understand the issue. The commit `edc68a0a` changed line 84 from `return data` to `return to_native_string(data)` to fix issue #2844, which was about encoding bytes parameters. However, this change broke binary data handling because `to_native_string` tries to decode bytes to string, which fails for binary data that isn't valid ASCII.

Let me also check what the original issue #2844 was about by looking at the test:

task_list.title: Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests
Phase 3: EXPLORATION - Find related files
task_list.notes: Found the issue in models.py line 84, _encode_params method

task_list.title: Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script
Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem and solution
Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix
